entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then 40 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
